## Data Structure 
### 關閉自動轉換為字串
```{r}
options(stringsAsFactors = F)
```

### data frame
- the wrong way
```{r}
data.frame(x = 1:3, y = list(1:2, 1:3, 1:4)) # wrong way
```

- correcting it
```{r}
data.frame(x = 1:3, y = I(list(1:2, 1:3, 1:4))) # use `I()` 
```
